questions.statement: Hi, I’m Sam 1.0 - a robot designed to help you around your home.
questions.question: How do you respond?
steps: I wouldn’t be comfortable sharing my life with a machine
Interesting… I’d like to know more about how it could help
That’s cool, but I’m waiting for Sam 2.0 coming later this year

questions.statement: With the many ways of consuming news…
questions.question: How do you find out what’s happening in the world?

questions.statement: It’s Friday night and you have had a busy week.
questions.question: How do you feel?
steps: Pull out the phone book and call the landline
Find them on social and DM them

questions.statement: A new chatbot is released that gives personal advice on healthy eating
questions.question: Would you try it?
steps: I might try it if others think it’s good

questions.statement: You’re reading an article online and see an ad for a desk you were looking to buy last week.
questions.question: How do you feel?
steps: A little concerned how they know…
It is unsettling, but can be helpful
It is very helpful to see ads related to my interests

questions.statement: Bringing the outside in can reduce stress.
questions.question: How do you embrace the peace of nature?
steps: Well-maintained pot plants and floral patterns
Vases of hand-picked flowers and pots of kitchen herbs
Free-growing plants and flowers, loose and wild
